text: Cooking oil is clean fat from plants or animals that is used for cooking. It is usually a liquid. Cooking oils can either be refined or cold extracted. Some of the many different kinds of cooking oils are: * Olive oil * Coconut oil * Avocado oil * Canola oil * Corn oil * Cottonseed oil * Sunflower oil * Safflower oil * Peanut oil * Grapeseed oil * Sesame oil * Soybean oil * Argan oil * Rice bran oil * Vegetable oil * Oils from tree nuts (E.g. cashew, almond, macadamia, etc.) ==Other websites==
title: Cooking oil
